      • iter

        public abstract int iter()
        Get an iterator over items, usually the position within an array. Intended usage: 
         
 for (int iter = v.iter(); v.iterValid(iter); iter = v.iterAdvance(iter)) {
   final int item = v.iterItem(iter);
   // Do something.
 }
        Returns:
        Iterator
